Returns a {{domxref("VideoPlaybackQuality")}} object for the currently played video.

{{domxref("AudioTrack.sourceBuffer")}}, {{domxref("VideoTrack.sourceBuffer")}}, {{domxref("TextTrack.sourceBuffer")}}

Returns the {{domxref("SourceBuffer")}} that created the track in question.

title: Media Source API
summary: The Media Source API, formally known as Media Source Extensions (MSE), provides functionality enabling plugin-free web-based streaming media. Using MSE, media streams can be created via JavaScript, and played using <audio> and <video> elements.
pageTitle: Media Source API - Web APIs | MDN
